Introduction

Selenium Webdriver is a collection of core java classes and interfaces. It is just a collection of .jar files which does not contain UI, record and playback feature. It supports multiple browsers like Firefox, IE, Chrome, Safari, and Opera. It supports multiple languages like Java, C#, Python, Pearl, and Php. It supports multiple OS Windows, Linux, â€¦
